Corrigendum 
 
Subject:- 
Issuance of  one time airport  entry  permits based 
on BCAS Circular  No. 46/2005 dated 29.11.2005. 
 
 
In continuation to this  Bureau  Circular  No.46/2005 dated 
29.11.2005 Shift In-charge/ Airport Manager, AAI at Delhi, Mumbai, 
Kolkata and Chennai airports may also issue airport entry permit for 
one to two hours duration only for operational purposes which shall 
be recorded in writing and it shall be ensured that such temporary 
pass holders are accompanied by regular staff with Photo Identity 
Cards.  
 
2. 
The passenger whose baggage is missing may also be issued 
with temporary airport entry passes  provided request for issue of 
such passes is received from the Station Manager of the concerned 
aircraft operator.  
 
3. 
Application form for issue of one time entry permit shall be the 
same as prescribed at   Annexure-I of the above circular. 
 
4. 
Shift In-charge/ Airport Manager shall ensure maintenance of a 
register for issue of temporary permits on the format prescribed at  
Annexure-II of the above circular  and the details of the same shall be 
included in the weekly report to be sent to the concerned Regional 
Dy. Commissioner of Security (CA), BCAS and the BCAS Hqrs.  
 
 
(R.D. Gupta)
